articles.description: If you have the latest ninth-gen iPad, or a previous-gen iPad Air or iPad Pro, Woot has a fantastic sale on Apple’s Smart Keyboard. You can also find deals on Anker’s port-packed USB-C hub, the Oculus Elite Strap, and much more.
articles.content:
Plus, save on powerful USB-C hubs, customizable Xbox controllers, and more
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.

articles.title: Low-cost Visible carrier launches free trial program for iPhone using eSIM - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Visible, the low-cost subsidiary of Verizon, has become a popular alternative in the US to the big three carriers for iPhone users over the last several years. In a new announcement this week, Visible is making it easier to try out its service on iPhone befor…
